actions.committee: Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Select Committee on Indian Affairs.

official_title: A bill to reaffirm the right of State education agencies and school districts to expend funds appropriated for school construction and other purposes under the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act.

summary.text: Amends the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act to require school construction, renovation and acquisition contracts executed under the Act to provide that the contracting school districts or agencies shall be able to expend monies received under the Act and enter such additional subcontracts as are necessary to achieve the contracts' objectives.

titles.title: A bill to reaffirm the right of State education agencies and school districts to expend funds appropriated for school construction and other purposes under the Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act.
